ActorTalk: Commandant, there's a big crowd gathering over there. Shall we go check it out?
Thank you... everyone... for watching. Today's performance... ends here.
Next up is the exciting cake-cutting ceremony, rawr!
Aren't they... the managers of the Ocean Heart flagship store and the Akdilek branch?
Oh wow! It's [PlayerName] and Miss Lucia! Come on up, rawr!
The Ocean Heart flagship store... and Akdilek... have decided to start joint operations... beginning today!
Lots of customers tried our burgers with Akdilek's spices and said they were absolutely irresistible, rawr!
For the sake of long-term growth, we've decided to team up and produce this brand-new kind of burger, rawr!
To celebrate our partnership, we held a live show and a cake-cutting ceremony. And we think [PlayerName] is the perfect person to cut the cake, rawr!
I agree... If not for you two... exposing the real troublemaker... this partnership wouldn't have happened.
Alright. I understand.
Please wait on stage for a moment. We want to capture the cake-cutting as a keepsake! We're just adjusting the camera, rawr!
Are you enjoying the celebration, Commandant?
Getting to spend time with you like this... of course I'm happy.
Looking at this cake makes me think about wishes. If it's alright...
Yes. I wish that in the future, I can spend more moments like this with you.
Wherever we are, I want to do more things with you. Make lots of good memories...
You two! The camera's ready, rawr!
Now, starting countdown—
Three, two, one—
I hope... our wishes will stay intertwined and bloom into something beautiful as we move toward the future.
I'm glad to hear that.
Maybe it's a little noisy here? Let's find somewhere quieter to rest afterward.
What's going on here?
Congratulations.
Turned from rivals to partners so fast?
Want to do this together, Lucia?
Of course. We made this happen together.
Yeah, it's been great.
It's alright.
Do you have a wish right now, Lucia?
Same here.
Your wish will come true.
What about you, Lucia? Are you enjoying yourself?
